text: ao aah li kitea b. chea karpit nasa anakneasar( mou ham meat) robsa yeung ban mokadl puok anak daoy ke banhcheak brab puok anak(nouv karpit) khn del banda anakneasar ban katphdach muoy ry daembi komaoy puok anak niyeay tha anak phdal damnoeng rikreay ning anak dasatuen promean minban mokadl puok yeung laey . chea karpit nasa anak phdal damnoeng rikreay ning anak dasatuen promean ban mokadl puok anak . haey a l laoh mean anoupheap leu avei teangoasa
